content.text:
# 38th Japan Record Awards

The 38th Annual Japan Record Awards took place on December 31, 1996, starting at 6:30PM JST. The primary ceremonies were televised in Japan on TBS.
Award winners
*Japan Record Award:
**Tetsuya Komuro (producer) & Namie Amuro for "Don't Wanna Cry"
*Best Vocalist:
**Yoshimi Tendo
*Best New Artist:
**Puffy AmiYumi
*Best Album:
**globe for "globe"
External links
*[http://www.jacompa.or.jp/ Official Website]
